pending_removal.description:
The U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) integration is pending removal from Home Assistant and will no longer be available as of Home Assistant 2022.10.

The integration is being removed, because it relies on webscraping, which is not allowed.

Remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
pending_removal.title: The USCIS integration is being removed
